comments.en:
This is a multi-function device with scanner, scanning is not supported but printing works perfectly.

J.C. Bradfield (jcb@dcs.ed.ac.uk) has written a fully functional driver which converts PPM files. He started hacking ghostscript, but abandoned it.

Also listed as supported at 300/600/1200x600 dpi in the "md2k" driver documentation.
